title: Paul Morantz, Lawyer Who Campaigned Against Cults, Dies at 77
description: He took on sects and other fringe groups in California, as well as abusive psychotherapists and a self-help guru. At one point assassins tried to kill him with a rattlesnake.
dc:creator: Clay Risen
media:description: In 1978, assassins tried to kill Mr. Morantz by placing a rattlesnake in his mailbox. He survived the bite but was in the hospital for six days, drawing intense news media interest.
